text: Shizhe a! Naxie koucheng xindao, er neixin bu xin de ren, he yuan feng youtaijiao de, tamen zhong dou you zhengxian pan jiao de ren, ni buyao yin tamen de pan jiao er youchou.(Tamen) shi wei zaoyao er qingting (ni de yanlun) de, shi ti bie de minzhong er tanting (xiaoxi) de, naxie minzhong, meiyou lai kan ni, tamen cuangai jing wen, tamen shuo:“Ruguo gei nimen zhege (panjue), nimen jiu keyi jieshou; ruguo bu gei nimen zhege, jiu shen wu jieshou.” An la yao chengfa shei, ni jue buneng wei shei ganshe an la yi sihao. Zhe deng ren, an la bu yu xidi tamen de xin; tamen zai jinshi yao shou lingru, zai houshi yao shou zhongda de xingfa
